name: Chorrie
long_description: At Chorrie, we are empowering medical billing teams to automate their revenue cycle management and catch insurance claim denials and under-billing before it happens.  We provide an AI-powered no-code platform to turn tedious manual claims checks into automated ones, allowing us to scale esoteric subject-matter expertise specific to an individual practice or team.  Our platform integrates directly with native EMR systems, allowing for easy optimization without workflow disruption.
one_liner: Eliminate medical claim denials & underbilling with AI
